content: this pattern on ravelry to fit up to a 30 /76cm chest knit round to the last original sleeve stitch ssk worked over look for the pattern gidday the last of the sleeve sts and the first of the picked up sts k4 place sm to indicate sor k4 k2tog worked over the last of the picked up sts and the first of the sleeve sts knit to end of round stitch count 34 36 rounds 1-6 knit round 7 knit until last 5 sts ssk k3 round 8 k3 k2tog knit to end of round stitch count 32 34 for pattern support please visit my group on ravelry tikki love or email me at tikkiknits@gmail com you can find me on ravelry as tikki please visit website http //www tikkiknits com au/skill-level html for further information on skill level categories © georgie nicolson 2014 all rights reserved pattern is for personal use only /tikkiknits @tikkiknits www tikkiknits com au © georgie nicolson 2014 all rights reserved
